    • createBlastDatabases

      public static void createBlastDatabases(String pathInput, String[] genomesInput, boolean nucleotide, boolean smallORF)
      Create blast database for each genome contained in GenomeFolder !!!!!!!!!! WARNING !!!!!!!! Only the first .faa or .fna file will be taken into account Since 2016 NCBI RefSeq database is organized with only one fna file for each genome
      Throws:
      IOException
